text: Wavel Ramkalawan (born 15 March 1961) is a Seychellois politician and Anglican priest. He is the 5th and current President of Seychelles. Ramkalawan was an opposition MP from 1993 to 2011 and 2016 to 2020. He also was the Leader of the Opposition from 1998 to 2011 and 2016 to 2020. On 25 October 2020, Ramkalawan was elected President of the Republic of Seychelles. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Anglican priests Category:Current national leaders Category:Presidents of Seychelles Category:Alumni of the University of Birmingham
title: Wavel Ramkalawan
